Note: Source of Candidate Data: A =Active Waitlist,R= Removed from Waitlist,L=Live Don Organ Recipient never on waitlist
Organ of this waitlisted record (KI: Kidney)
Organ type with pancreas expanded to PTA and PAK
Transplant Procedure Type (101: Left kidney, 102: Right kidney BUT more codes with kidney!)
Encrypted Unique Donor ID (all donors) - foreign key
Listing Date - date/time candidate was physically added to the waiting list - this date/time does not change for transfers
If removed due to Death, date of death
Primary Diagnosis / KI Diagnosis for KP Candidate
If Candidate has had a prior Kidney Transplant, is the prior Kidney graft still functioning?
Activation Date - date/time waiting time clock started
Date Candidate met the minimum Creatinine Clearance to begin accuring waiting time
Minimum acceptable donor Serum Creainine - Final
Minimum acceptable donor Serum Creatinine - Peak
Initial Peak PRA (max of peak, cur)
